PAD_InvestigatedOx.synopsis: Player discovers the dead ox that was part of the tiefling refugee caravan. The ox became shadowcursed before being killed by the tieflings. The player rolls an Investigation check to understand the circumstances of the ox's death

PAD_InvestigatedKidnapping.synopsis: The player finds the location where Zevlor kidnapped the tiefling refugees. A successful Investigation check reveals information about what happened at the scene

PAD_InvestigatedTiefling.synopsis: The player finds a dead tiefling near the refugee's abandoned caravan. The tiefling was killed by the shadowcursed ox. The player rolls a Medicine check to determine the tiefling's death

PAD_InvestigatedOx_0.speaker: Player
PAD_InvestigatedOx_0.text: Hells. Poor thing didn't deserve to die like this.
PAD_InvestigatedOx_0.context: NodeContext: Commenting on a dead ox at the site of an ambushed refugee caravan
